title: Evolution: the four billion year legacy
creator_credit: David F. Oyster, David Kennard, Richard Wells, Rob McCain, Gregory Andorfer, Carl Sagan Productions and KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.)
brief_description: Dr. Carl Sagan discusses the fossil record, the respective evolutionary theories of Darwin and Wallace and the alternative explanation of a “great designer”. Shows that life forms developed comparatively late in terms of the development of the cosmos as a whole and a computer-animated sequence recapitulates the path of evolution from the single-celled organism to the first human.
